channel.title: Changing items values in shops
channel.description: How can I change an items value for how much it sells for or how much the person buys for in a shop? Details please don't just run by and say "in shops.cfg"[br][size=1]Posted at: July 17, 2006, 12:28:49 PM[/size][hr]noooo onnnee[br][size=1]Posted at: July 17, 2006, 12:48:52 PM[/size][hr]please help :o

item.title: Changing items values in shops
item.dc:creator: @tracuer93 tracuer93
item.description:
@tracuer93 wrote:

order is

1rst number = buy
2nd = sell
3rd = alch price

Read full topic

item.title: Changing items values in shops
item.dc:creator: @inuyasha_12345 inuyasha 12345
item.description:
@inuyasha_12345 wrote:

Go to your Item.cfg, press cntr+f and type in the item name (spaces usually _ on unedited stuff) and over there will be 3 numbers (I’m not sure in the order that they come but i think the first is high alc and third shop sell price) not entirely sure on that part, to edit the items your shops have go to Shops.cfg, go to your shop you want to edit, shop types the first 2 numbers, turn them both to 1 if you qwant to be able to sell items to the shops that arent being sold there, and 2 if u want only items sold there to be sold, and next there are item ids and amount. hop3 th8s helps

Read full topic

item.title: Changing items values in shops
item.dc:creator: @darkdungeon3 darkdungeon3
item.description:
@darkdungeon3 wrote:

prices cant be chanced as far as i found out but you can take the item out of the shop by going2 shops.cfg and look in item DB for the item IDnr then go back2 shops.cfg and delete the item and price at the persen you want or chance the amount of items he salls thats all i know about it

Read full topic
